title.value: Functioning of the rape raw material market
Functioning of the rape raw material market

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Bondarovich, L.A., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies of economic value of cultivation rape (Brassica napus), and also the basic directions of its processing are allocated. The definition of the rape market most full reflecting its essence is formulated. The structure and basic elements of the analyzed market is defined. The interrelation of the rape market with other branch markets is designated. The essence of demand on rape, its principal views is analyzed, and also the factors influencing its change are allocated. In the conclusion creation of integration structures on purpose is offered to perfection of functioning of the rape market. Integration should take place on the basis of maintenance of technical, technological, economic unity and a continuity of production phases, preparation, transportation, storage and processing of rape raw material. The rational organization of raw zones, i.e. an arrangement of rape sowing facilities on optimum distance from the processing enterprises and making rape in the quantities allowing as much as possible to load productive processing capacity.
